channel.title: WANTED: Axocontrol (thonk) or similar
channel.description: Hello, I’m looking for an axocontrol to purchase. Or an acrylic enclosure. I have an NIB axoloti that I want to start using but it seems like the scene is fading out and accessories are hard to find. Thanks!
